headline: Western Digital, Warner Music Group, PayPal, IMAX, and FirstCash Shares Skyrocket, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks jumped in the afternoon session after the major indices rebounded, as Fed Chair Jerome Powell delivered dovish remarks at the much-awaited Jackson Hole symposium. Powell suggested that with inflation risks moderating and unemployment remaining low, the Federal Reserve might consider a shift in its monetary policy stance, including potential interest rate cuts. headline: PayPal (PYPL): Evaluating Valuation After Recent Share Price Slide
summary: If you hold PayPal Holdings (PYPL) or are considering buying in, the recent share price moves might have made you do a double take. There isn’t a single headline driving the latest action; however, PYPL’s continued slide is catching investor attention and raising the question of whether the market is signaling a reset for this payments heavyweight. Looking at the numbers, PayPal shares have slipped around 22% so far this year, extending a longer-term pattern of underperformance compared to...

headline: DOJ Won’t Pursue Coders Who Build Decentralized Platforms in Good Faith
summary: The US Justice Department will not target software developers who create decentralized platforms for transmitting cryptocurrencies without criminal intent, a senior official said on Thursday.Acting Assistant Attorney General Matthew Galeotti told a digital assets summit in Wyoming that writing computer code by itself is not a crime. “Our view is ...
